name: Arulalan.T
body:
### List of my projects using UV-CDAT
1. [UVCDAT-mmDiagnosis](https://github.com/arulalant/mmDiagnosis)
2. [UVCDAT-chutil](https://github.com/arulalant/UVCDAT-chutil)

4. [CMIPs-Handler](https://github.com/arulalant/CMIPs-Handler)
5. [numpy-utils](https://github.com/arulalant/numpy-utils)

### List of my hobby projects 
1. [20-20-20](https://github.com/arulalant/20-20-20)
2. [live_reveal](https://github.com/arulalant/live_reveal)
3. [Marraige-Invitaion.Py](https://github.com/arulalant/marriage-invitation-python)

### List of my project for Tamil 
1. [txt2ipa](https://github.com/arulalant/txt2ipa)
2. [txt2unicode](https://github.com/arulalant/txt2unicode)

### To Do Project Ideas
1. BUFR writer in python/UV-CDAT
2. grib[1][2] writer in python/UV-CDAT
2. nc2grib.py


### Contact
Having trouble with any one of my projects? contact me arulalant@gmail.com Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
